TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(CUSTOMER_ID=CUSTOMER_ID1 AND (FIRST_NAME != FIRST_NAME1 OR MOBILE != MOBILE1 OR ADDRESS1 != ADDRESS11 OR ZIPCODE != ZIPCODE1 OR COUNTRY != COUNTRY1),true, false)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: update_record_flag

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.CUSTOMER_KEY as CUSTOMER_KEY, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.FIRST_NAME as FIRST_NAME, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.MOBILE as MOBILE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.ADDRESS1 as ADDRESS1, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.ZIPCODE as ZIPCODE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.COUNTRY as COUNTRY, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.EFF_DATE as EFF_DATE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.END_DATE as END_DATE, T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER_ID FROM T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE where T_CUSTOMER_SCD_DATE.END_DATE=to_date('12/31/9999','mm/dd/yyyy')

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
